alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Carlton; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 11:14PM CDT until June 21 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL AITKIN...NORTHWESTERN PINE AND CARLTON COUNTIES... At 1113 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tamarack, to near Kettle River, to 6 miles northwest of Willow River, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cloquet, Mahtowa, Barnum, Cromwell, Kettle River, Tamarack, Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area, Nemadji, Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, Sturgeon Lake, Nickerson, Automba, Wright, Denham, Arthyde, Moose Lake State Park, Sawyer, Ronald, and Kettle Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
